name: Bouncy Archery
description:
Try to hit the target with your arrows!

It can be hit from every angle and every BOUNCE the arrow makes before hitting the target is a POINT with a maximum of 5 bounces per shot.

This means that hitting the target without bouncing gives 0 points.

If you get creative you can get definitely get more than 33 points. Getting 40 points (max) is possible.
